Text.val: 22.04.2014 SH SCR18847 Added test RSDF_SCF = N in task to check if it's a restart (skip BCM415A)
24.06.2013 GB SCR18227 Changed calculation for RSDF_COMMISSIONTOTAL
13.02.2013 SH SCR17840 BCM415A Diff. changes regarding interest calculation
-- Finally submit BXA415 to create the specifications for the participants

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum (SCHI_FACTORINGCOMMC + SCHI_ADDITIONALCOMMC + SCHI_CREDNOTESADDCOMMC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/SCHI where SCHI_SCHT_NO in (select SCHT_NO from :1/SCHT where year(SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV) = :5 and month(SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV) = :6 and (SCHT_ADMNO, SCHT_CLNTNO) in (select CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT102_CLNTNO from :1/CLNT where CLNT103_COMM_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = :3 and CLNT108_ACC_CURR = ':4' and CLNT103_COMM_CLNTNO = CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO)) for fetch only
select cast(sum(TPIB_BALANCEINTERESTCALC * TPIB_NUMBEROFDAYS) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/TPIB where TPIB_RUNNUMBER = :2 and TPIB_ADMNO = :3 and TPIB_CLNTNO = :4 and TPIB_TYPE = 1 for fetch only
select cast(sum(SCHT_TOTACOMMC) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/SCHT where SCHT_ADMNO = :2 and SCHT_CLNTNO = :3 and year(SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV) = :4 and month(SCHT_SCHEDDATERECV) = :5 for fetch only

Text.val: -- Get interest percentage for further updates

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(RSDF_INTERESTTOTAL) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/RSDF where RSDF_COMM_ADMNO = :2 and RSDF_COMM_CLNTNO = :3 and RSDF_DATE = ':4' and RSDF_PARTICIPANT = 'N' for fetch only

Text.val: -- If RSDF_INTERESTSHARE <> 0 then credit the client for the interest share
-- If RSDF_COMMISSIONSHARE <> 0 then credit the client for the commission share
